references.paper_title: nuScenes: A multimodal dataset for autonomous driving
references.reason: This paper introduces the nuScenes dataset, a large-scale multimodal dataset crucial for evaluating the performance of 3D object detection models in autonomous driving and is directly used for experiments in this paper.

references.paper_title: Are we ready for autonomous driving? The KITTI vision benchmark suite
references.reason: This paper introduces the KITTI dataset, a widely used benchmark dataset for autonomous driving, which serves as the primary training dataset in the experiments of this paper.

references.paper_title: Train in Germany, test in the USA: Making 3D object detectors generalize
references.reason: This paper investigates the domain adaptation problem in 3D object detection, directly addressing a key challenge tackled by the proposed method in this paper.

references.paper_title: Ithaca365: Dataset and driving perception under repeated and challenging weather conditions
references.reason: This paper introduces the Ithaca365 dataset, another real-world dataset used for evaluating domain adaptation capabilities of 3D object detectors, providing further validation for the proposed method.

references.paper_title: PointRCNN: 3D Object Proposal Generation and Detection From Point Cloud
references.reason: This paper introduces PointRCNN, a 3D object detection method used as a baseline in the experiments, demonstrating the efficacy of the proposed method in improving the performance of existing detectors.
